title: Drawing, "Lady Esther Yacht: Cantilevered Table", 1934–35
description: Two drawings for cantilevered table for Lady Esther Yacht. Drawing below in lighter graphite shows desk extending from left from cabinet or wall. Rounded right side, supported by one leg. On top of unit at left of desk is curved, vertical lighting fixture with light directed towards surface of table. Drawing above is more detailed rendering of cantilevered table with right side curved and one leg on right side. Unit to left of table has long, vertical lighting fixture with light directed towards surface of desk.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Lady Esther Yacht: Cantilevered Table", 1934–35.
1934–35. Graphite on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-305-4.
